mapper.select: -- MainMapper > selectRecentKeywordProduct SELECT PD_IDX, PD_SUBJECT, PD_PRICE, i.image1 AS 'IMG', c.value AS 'PD_STATUS_VALUE', CASE WHEN PD_STATUS = 'PDS01' THEN 'non_overlay' WHEN PD_STATUS = 'PDS02' THEN 'overlay' WHEN PD_STATUS = 'PDS03' THEN 'overlay' END AS PD_STATUS_COLOR, -- 수정 필요 CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()) < 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()), ' 초전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()) < 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()), ' 분전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()) < 24 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()), ' 시간전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()), ' 일전') END AS RD_DATE FROM product p JOIN common c ON p.PD_STATUS = c.code JOIN images i ON p.PD_IMAGE = i.IMG_IDX WHERE PD_STATUS != 'PDS03' AND CONCAT(IFNULL(PD_TAG1, ''), '|', IFNULL(PD_TAG2, ''), '|', IFNULL(PD_TAG3, ''), '|', IFNULL(PD_TAG4, ''), '|', IFNULL(PD_TAG5, ''), '|', IFNULL(PD_SUBJECT, '')) REGEXP #{keyword} ORDER BY PD_IDX

-- MainMapper > getPopularProcuts SELECT PD_IDX, PD_SUBJECT, PD_PRICE, i.image1 AS 'IMG', c.value AS 'PD_STATUS_VALUE', CASE WHEN PD_STATUS = 'PDS01' THEN 'out-of-stock' WHEN PD_STATUS = 'PDS02' THEN 'price-dec' WHEN PD_STATUS = 'PDS03' THEN 'new' END AS PD_STATUS_COLOR, CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()) < 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()), ' 초전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()) < 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()), ' 분전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()) < 24 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()), ' 시간전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()), ' 일전') END AS RD_DATE FROM product p JOIN common c ON p.PD_STATUS = c.code JOIN images i ON p.PD_IMAGE = i.IMG_IDX WHERE PD_STATUS != 'PDS03' ORDER BY PD_READCOUNT DESC LIMIT 10

-- MainMapper > getRecentLookProduct SELECT PD_IDX, PD_SUBJECT, PD_PRICE, i.image1 AS 'IMG', c.value AS 'PD_STATUS_VALUE', CASE WHEN PD_STATUS = 'PDS01' THEN 'non_overlay' WHEN PD_STATUS = 'PDS02' THEN 'overlay' WHEN PD_STATUS = 'PDS03' THEN 'overlay' END AS PD_STATUS_COLOR, CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()) < 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()), ' 초전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()) < 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()), ' 분전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()) < 24 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()), ' 시간전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()), ' 일전') END AS RD_DATE FROM product p JOIN common c ON p.PD_STATUS = c.code JOIN images i ON p.PD_IMAGE = i.IMG_IDX WHERE PD_IDX = #{prodcut}

-- MainMapper > getTradeRecentLookProduct SELECT PD_IDX, PD_SUBJECT, PD_PRICE, i.image1 AS 'IMG', CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()) < 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()), ' 초전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()) < 1 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()), ' 분전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()) < 24 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()), ' 시간전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, PD_REG_DATE, NOW()), ' 일전') END AS RD_DATE FROM product p JOIN common c ON p.PD_STATUS = c.code JOIN images i ON p.PD_IMAGE = i.IMG_IDX WHERE PD_IDX = #{prodcutId}
